name: Hentai Tales: Mysterious Clinic
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

There is a clinic in a back alley in this city that claims to be able to cure all ailments, and do so in a pleasant way.
Doctors here use sex therapy to treat patients, using the pleasure generated by sex with the doctor's secret treatment techniques to treat all illnesses.
You heard rumors and came to this clinic.
What will happen there?

Characters

Mengiru:

The receptionist at the mysterious clinic has pink hair and an attractive figure.
It will be her who helps you before a formal diagnosis is made.

Jousen:

She is the assistant of the attending physician. She has short blond hair and a beautiful face.
She will help the doctor give you a very comfortable treatment.

Serura:

Your attending doctor will diagnose and treat you during the treatment.
She uses very specific sex treatments that will make you feel great.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
